title: Warmth for Dhaka Slums
description: Help us distribute winter jackets and blankets to families living in Dhaka's urban slums. Your donation will keep children and elders warm this winter.

title: Sylhet Hill Tracts Blanket Drive
description: Support our volunteers as they deliver warm clothes to remote villages in the Sylhet hill tracts. Every contribution helps a family survive the cold.

title: Rajshahi Rural Outreach
description: Join our campaign to provide sweaters and shawls to the rural poor in Rajshahi. Your generosity can make a real difference this winter.

title: Chattogram Coastal Aid
description: Donate warm clothing for coastal communities in Chattogram facing harsh winter winds. Help us reach the most vulnerable.

title: Khulna Blanket Distribution
description: We are collecting blankets and warm clothes for low-income families in Khulna. Your support will help them stay warm and healthy.

title: Barisal Winter Relief
description: Help us deliver winter essentials to the elderly and children in Barisal. Every donation counts in saving lives during the cold season.

title: Mymensingh Community Warmth
description: Support our efforts to provide winter clothing to underprivileged communities in Mymensingh. Together, we can make a difference.

title: Rangpur Blanket for All
description: Join our Rangpur campaign to distribute blankets and warm clothes to those in need. Your kindness brings hope and warmth.
